module.name: @MODULE_NAME@
module.author: James Egg
module.description: Patient matching module uses an external database for probabilistic patient matching

globalProperty.description: This file can be found at doc/link_config.xml
All properties that contains any of this element will be excluded
URL pointing to the production server
The number of patients to read per page
Used when testing patient matching to limit number of pages read (leave blank for production use)

param.name: include
param.value: personId, names, addresses, attributes, gender, birthdate, birthdateEstimated, age, dead, voided, personName, personAddress, attributeMap

param.name: include
param.value: personNameId, preferred, prefix, givenName, middleName, familyNamePrefix, familyName, familyName2, familyNameSuffix, degree, voided

param.name: include
param.value: personAddressId, preferred, address1, address2, cityVillage, neighborhoodCell, countyDistrict, townshipDivision, region, subregion, stateProvince, country, postalCode, latitude, longitude, voided

param.name: include
param.value: personAttributeTypeId, name, format, foreignKey, description, searchable, retired

param.name: include
param.value: patientId, identifiers, voided, personId, names, addresses, attributes, gender, birthdate, birthdateEstimated, age, deathdate, dead, personName, personAddress, attributeMap

param.name: include
param.value: patientIdentifierTypeId, name, format, required, formatDescription, checkDigit, description, validator, retired, patientIdentifier

param.name: include
param.value: locationId, name, description, address1, address2, cityVillage, stateProvince, country, postalCode, latitude, longitude, countyDistrict, neighborhoodCell, townshipDivision, region, subregion, retired

dwr.signatures: import java.util.List; import java.util.Set; import @MODULE_PACKAGE@.web.dwr.DWRMatchingConfigUtilities; import @MODULE_PACKAGE@.web.dwr.DWREstimationUtilities; DWRMatchingConfigUtilities.getAllBlockingRuns() DWRMatchingConfigUtilities.getAllPatientMatchingConfigurations() DWRMatchingConfigUtilities.getAllReports() DWRMatchingConfigUtilities.deleteBlockingRun(String) DWRMatchingConfigUtilities.doAnalysis(String) DWRMatchingConfigUtilities.resetStep() DWRMatchingConfigUtilities.deleteReportFile(String) DWRMatchingConfigUtilities.setReportName(String) DWRMatchingConfigUtilities.getNextPage() DWRMatchingConfigUtilities.getPrevPage() DWRMatchingConfigUtilities.getStep() DWRMatchingConfigUtilities.previousProcessStatus() DWRMatchingConfigUtilities.getStartPage() DWRMatchingConfigUtilities.getEndPage() DWRMatchingConfigUtilities.selStrategy(String) DWRMatchingConfigUtilities.getPatient(String) DWRMatchingConfigUtilities.mergePatients(String) DWRMatchingConfigUtilities.excludePatients(String) DWREstimationUtilities.getEstimationInfomation(array) DWREstimationUtilities.getEstimatedPairs() DWREstimationUtilities.getEstimatedTimeToRun() DWREstimationUtilities.getTotalRecords()
